author: Darrell Etherington
title: Ford, 3M, GE and the UAW to build respirators, ventilators and faceshields for coronavirus fight
description: Ford announced the details of its current manufacturing efforts around building much-needed medical supplies for front-line healthcare workers and COVID-19 patients on Tuesday. Its efforts include building Powered Air-Purifying Respirators (PAPRs) with partne…
